translation.en: [ Man ] I'm gonna talk to Parker about my promotion today.
translation.ko: 오늘은 파커한테 승진 얘길 할 거야

translation.en: And the worst-case scenario,
translation.ko: 최악의 경우래 봤자 자기가 2주일 먼저 도착해서

translation.en: you're two weeks ahead of me, you get a gorgeous little apartment in the Marais.
translation.ko: 최악의 경우래 봤자 자기가 2주일 먼저 도착해서 마레에 멋진 아파트를 얻는 거지

translation.en: What if I don't want to live in the Marais?
[ Man ] We could live somewhere else then.
Yeah. Yeah?
We could go to Detroit.
- Detroit? - Yeah, you could meet my mom and dad.
You can meet my sister. She owns a bakery.
- And she will make you fat. - [ Laughs ]
translation.ko: 누나 때문에 살 좀 찔 거야

translation.en: I have six hours before I have to go back to the hospital.
You wanna go back into bed with me?
[ Beeping ] I do.
But I got back-to-back meetings all morning.
Too bad for you.
[ Beeping ] Yeah, I know. But I gotta get in.
translation.ko: 그러게 가봐야 해, 벌써 문밖에 25명쯤 줄 서 있을 거야

translation.en: There's probably already 25 people lined up outside the door, waiting.
translation.ko: 가봐야 해, 벌써 문밖에 25명쯤 줄 서 있을 거야

translation.en: Je vous aime.
I love when you speak French.
[ Woman ]nging ] SATCOM check.
Echo Nine Three Victor Echo Two.
[ Man ] Ops Center.
This is safe house seven-R. We're open for business.
Confirmed.
Any reservations?
Nothing in the registry.
Walk-ins? Not expected. Reconfirm in three hours.
translation.ko: - 예약 없이 올 손님은? - 없다, 3시간 후에 재확인할 것

translation.en: Understood.
[ Man ] Matt. Your cell. Really?
Relax. I've got an encryption packet.
Well, you know me. I never relax.
Watch the cholesterol, old man.
You sound like Miriam.
So, what's new in Cape Town? Nothing, nothing.
translation.ko: 케이프타운은 별일 없나? 네, 제 타깃 분석 보고서를 업데이트해서 재전송했어요

translation.en: I updated my Surveillance Target Analysis. It's complete now.
translation.ko: 네, 제 타깃 분석 보고서를 업데이트해서 재전송했어요

translation.en: Yeah, that's an exit report. It's not due till you leave.
Exactly. Exactly. And when-- when is that?
How long has it been?
Twelve months. Well, talk to me in another four.
Je-- David, I'm-- I'm dying here. What's happening with the post in Paris?
translation.ko: 데이비드, 갑갑해 죽겠어요 파리 발령은 어떻게 됐죠?

translation.en: One slot and 37 applicants.
Every one of them with more field experience than you.
Okay, how am I supposed to get more experience? I'm staring at four walls all day.
translation.ko: 종일 벽만 보고 있는데 어떻게 실전 경험을 쌓아요?

translation.en: I got passed up on Rome, then Berlin.
You said yourself my evaluation was excellent. Just put it in front of Whitford.
translation.ko: 제 근무 성적 좋다며요? 휫퍼드에게 보고하면

translation.en: I know he'll see that I'm ready to go, I'm all in.
Matt, I know this has been hard, but it's the way the system works.
translation.ko: 매트, 힘든 건 알지만 원래 시스템이 그래

translation.en: Look, I'll talk to Whitford about Paris, but I can't promise anything.
translation.ko: 파리 건은 건의해 보겠네만 약속은 못 해

translation.en: Look, I gotta go.
Don't worry. I'm looking after you, okay?
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 내가 신경 쓰고 있어

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I know. I know.
[ Man ] This is not a negotiation.
It's 10 million.
You'll get the file, and if the money is not in the account by 3:00 p.m.,
translation.ko: 파일은 받게 될 거야 오후 3시까지 입금 안 되면

translation.en: I'll take it to another buyer.
[ Man #2 ] How do we know that you won't do that anyway?
You don't.
Here you are, sir.
Alec. How are you?
Petrus. 1972.
- You look good. - I do, don't I?
So, how are things at MI6? The usual.
Same bureaucratic bullshit and appalling remuneration.
translation.ko: 늘 그렇지, 썩은 관료주의에 세금 펑펑 쓰고…

translation.en: Life of a government man. Mm-hmm.
So--
The original file. Dates, transactions, names.
translation.ko: 원본 파일이야 날짜, 거래 내역, 이름

translation.en: A bargain at triple the price.
Take a look.
I've been waiting a long time for this.
Tobin. What's in that box...
is gonna make the world a smaller place for you-- for both of us.
translation.ko: 이건 우리에게 세계를 누빌 티켓이 돼줄 거야

translation.en: I got your account. You get your cut 24 hours after transaction.
Some of our old bosses aren't going to be happy these files are out in the open.
translation.ko: 이 파일이 샌 거 알면 우리 옛 보스들, 열 받겠지?

translation.en: Do I make you nervous?
Always. Good.
You want her?
Please listen to me.
I had nothing to do with this.
Stop.
[ Sirens Wailing ] Let's go.
Tobin, you have to believe me.
I knew nothing about any of that.
Did you know if anybody was following you? No.
I don't think anybody was following me.
I swear on my life, Tobin, I had absolutely-- [ Gunshot ]
Slow down.
We go in by foot.
Head towards the square.
We're heading west. Holland Street. Move, move.
Excuse me, sir.
My name is Tobin Frost.
Linklater.
When?
Lock down the consulate.
Get me a team in the situation room in five minutes.
translation.ko: 5분 안에 다 집합시키고 토빈 프로스트 자료 뽑아

translation.en: I want everything we got on Tobin Frost. [ Man ] Yes, ma'am.
translation.ko: 5분 안에 다 집합시키고 토빈 프로스트 자료 뽑아 네

translation.en: Is it him? Yeah.
Whitford know? I'm on my way there now.
translation.ko: - 네 - 휫퍼드도 아나? 지금 보고하러 가요

translation.en: Sir, place your finger in there until I tell you to stop.
translation.ko: 떼라고 할 때까지 손가락 대고 계세요

translation.en: [ Beeping ] Thank you.
translation.ko: 떼라고 할 때까지 손가락 대고 계세요 감사합니다

translation.en: So how long has he been playing in your backyard?
We're working to get you that answer right now.
- Meaning you don't know. - No, meaning we're looking into it.
The guy goes rogue. He spends nine years selling out the Agency to all takers.
translation.ko: 놈은 변절 후 9년간 러시아, 중국, 이란 등에

translation.en: To Russia, China, Iran, you name it.
Guy's just not gonna prance into an American consulate without good reason.
translation.ko: 이유 없이 미 영사관에 들어가진 않았을 겁니다

translation.en: All right! Listen up. Everybody off the phone.
Tobin Frost has just waltzed his way into a U.S. consulate in Cape Town, South Africa.
translation.ko: 토빈 프로스트가 방금 케이프타운 영사관에 들어갔다

translation.en: Now this man without question is one of the most notorious traitors that we've got.
translation.ko: 놈은 가장 악명 높은 정보 장사꾼 중 하나야

translation.en: Errington, call up his background profile.
[ Errington ] Tobin Frost was recruited into the Agency in 1984.
He tested off the charts in aptitude for psychological fieldwork.
His first assignment was in Lebanon in January 1985.
Three months later, he captured and flipped a high-ranking Hezbollah leader.
Over the next several years,
Frost successfully questioned and recruited many high-value individuals.
He became known as an expert manipulator of human assets,
and he literally rewrote Agency interrogation protocols.
Frost served in many active theaters, including Libya,
from 1995 to 1998, Jordan, '98 to 2000.
During his tenure in Jordan, Frost was suspected of leaking information to Mossad,
translation.ko: 당시 모사드에 정보를 판 의혹을 받았지만

translation.en: but nothing was confirmed.
Ten years ago, Frost went off the reservation completely.
He currently has no allegiancs and is wanted for espionage on four continents.
translation.ko: 현재 4개 대륙에서 간첩 혐의로 수배 중입니다

translation.en: His last known sighting is Hamburg, Germany in 2011.
You know, Harlan, we should interrogate Frost now.
Sweat him for everything he's got. Once he's stateside, we have fewer options.
translation.ko: 국내로 송환되면 우린 손 쓸 여지가 없어요

translation.en: I have an interrogator in Yemen. Can be there in eight hours.
I already have a team in Jo'burg that can be there in two.
We'll take Frost to the safe house, interrogate him there. My people are fully capable of handling this.
translation.ko: 안전 가옥에서 취조하면 돼요 최정예 팀입니다

translation.en: This is Tobin Frost.
We'll go with Jo'burg.
Okay.
You must turn around. [ Ball Thuds, Bounces ]
Help. Help.
[ Phone Rings ] Accident.
Housekeeping.
[ Man ] We have a last-minute reservation.
E.T.A. for check-in? Sometime tonight.
translation.ko: 도착 예정 시각은요? 오늘 밤중… 프리아크 보험회사

translation.en: Freeark Insurance. Got it.
Hey, where are you?
Parker just handed me his oversight papers to finis. And his daughter Chloe's got the measles. You believe that?
translation.ko: 파커가 자기 서류를 나더러 끝내래 딸이 홍역에 걸렸대

translation.en: How long you gonna be out for? I don't know. I don't know.
Okay. Well, look, I'm gonna dive into this, and then, um, hopefully I can meet up with you later, okay?
translation.ko: 빨리 작업 시작해야 해 이따 늦게라도 볼까?

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds good. Hey. Hey.
I love you. I love you too.
Bye. Bye.
Extraction team is in the air, sir.
They should be on the ground within the hour.
I want that team in and out of the city in less than 12 hours.
- We're not even supposed to have a presence in Cape Town. - [ Man ] Yes, sir.
translation.ko: 우리 흔적을 남겨선 안 돼 네

translation.en: [ Whitford ] Any communication about Frost's whereabouts... is strictly need to know.
translation.ko: 놈의 소재에 관한 교신 내용은 매번 보고해

translation.en: Sir, the extraction team's en route to the consulate now.
- Who's reaching out to seven-R? - Richards, ma'am.
I want the housekeeper briefed. High-priority target is coming in. I want the house quiet.
translation.ko: 관리 요원에게 VIP가 가니 보안 유지하라고 해

translation.en: Under no circumstances should there be any communication until the team has left.
translation.ko: 팀이 떠날 때까진 외부 접촉은 금지야

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
Yeah?
Account? You have a room?
Daniel Kiefer, Freeark Insurance. K-I-E-F-E-R.
Freeark Insurance. K-I-E-F-E-R.
- [ Man ] You are a go. - [ Dial Tone ]
You're good to go.
Hey, I'm Weston. Guest room?
Uh, it's right around the corner. Two rights and a left. All the way back.
translation.ko: 모퉁이 돌아 두 번 우회전 좌회전 후 쭉 가세요

translation.en: That's Tobin Frost. [ Kiefer ] Stay with him.
translation.ko: 토빈 프로스트네 잘 감시해, 가서 짐 내리자고

translation.en: Let's go download our gear. Yes, sir.
translation.ko: 잘 감시해, 가서 짐 내리자고 네

translation.en: - Linen closet? - Down the hall. Just right at the end there.
translation.ko: 수건 어딨나? 복도 맨 끝 벽장에요

translation.en: Kill all the surveillance cameras in this room.
translation.ko: 이 방 감시 카메라 다 꺼

translation.en: My name is Daniel Kiefer.
We were at the Farm together.
Technically, you were a year ahead.
I'm here to make you aware of your rights.
You're being held under a national security directive... which means you have none, but you know that.
translation.ko: 보안법 위반이니 넌 아무 권리가 없어, 알겠지만…

translation.en: Towels. You need 600s. Those are... 350, 375 gram weight.
You're gonna need 600s.
[ Kiefer ] I want to know the reasons for you being in Cape Town.
I want you to name your resources,
contacts, assets, everybody you've done business with, traded intel with,
translation.ko: 정보원들의 이름을 대 접촉자, 끄나풀… 네가 국가를 배신한 지난 9년간

translation.en: sold secrets to in the nine years since you betrayed your country.
translation.ko: 네가 국가를 배신한 지난 9년간 기밀을 사고판 모든 놈을 대

translation.en: Absolutely. Anything you want, Daniel.
Khalid Sheikh Mohammed lasted 20 seconds.
They had 600s.
Is this legal?
[ Kiefer ] Bring him down.
Bring him up.
How long was that? [ Panting ]
All right. Take him down.
Bring him up!
Get me a knife.
Miller.
Get in there with Frost.
- Sir, all the security cameras are down. - Reboot.
I wanna see what's out there. Copy that.
[ Loud Clang ] Let's go, boys!
Go! Go! Go! Go!
Let's go! Move!
Velez, take this corner.
Ericksson, get the back elevator.
Pope, what do you got?
Sir, I see approximately 12 heavily armed men in perimeter two.
[ Kiefer ] Okay, gents! Work four to add.
Two-by-two. Perimeter two.
Greer! Sir!
- [ Kiefer ] Ericksson! - Yes, sir!
[ Kiefer ] Velez!
Velez!
I'm good!
Let's go, fellas.
- [ Greer ] Incoming! - [ Kiefer ] Grenade! Oh, God!
- [ Groans ] - Greer!
Velez, three-round bursts!
Velez, where's Greer? He's over there, sir.
Go, son.
This ain't a test. This is the real thing.
What are you gonna do?
You don't wanna try me.
[ Kiefer ] Magazine! Let's go.
Velez! Stay there!
Listen to me! Stay there!
[ Machine Gun Fire ] Miller!
Miller!
Hey! Get in here!
Hey. Take these. Go watch him.
Hey. They're here for me, but they want me alive. You, they'll kill.
translation.ko: 놈들은 날 생포하길 원하지만 자넨 죽일 거야

translation.en: You got one in the chamber?
It's okay. I remember my first posting.
translation.ko: 긴장하지 마 내 첫 발령지는 리우데자네이루였지

translation.en: Rio de Janeiro. House like this.
translation.ko: 내 첫 발령지는 리우데자네이루였지 이런 데였어, 미인이 많았지

translation.en: Beautiful women. Not one single visitor. But I remember rule number one.
translation.ko: 이런 데였어, 미인이 많았지 방문객은 없었지만 규칙 1조는 기억해

translation.en: You are responsible for your houseguest. I'm your houseguest.
translation.ko: 손님의 안전을 책임진다 난 네 손님이야

translation.en: The clock is ticking. They gave you the keys.
translation.ko: 시간 계속 가, 방 열쇠 있지?

translation.en: Do your duty, son.
Shut up. Let me think.
You wanna be the guy that lost Tobin Frost?
translation.ko: 토빈 프로스트를 놓친 놈으로 기억되고 싶나?

translation.en: Ticktock, ticktock, ticktock, ticktock.
Where's Frost?
We're leaving.
Where is he?
Stay here! Stay here! Wait! Don't move!
translation.ko: 꼼짝 말고 여기 있어 움직이지 마!

translation.en: - Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! - [ Horn Honking ]
[ Chattering, Screaming ] [ Weston ] Go!
Get in the trunk.
You're serious? Yeah. Get in.
- The trunk? - Get in the trunk, now!
[ Yells ] No!
[ Line Ringing ] [ Man ] Ops Center.
- Echo Three Victor Echo Nine. - Go ahead.
This is Weston. Seven-R's been hit. Everyone's dead.
I need you to repeat that, please. Say again.
Kiefer, his team, everyone, they're all dead.
Stand by.
- Transferring. - [ Line Ringing ]
- [ Richards ] It's the house. - [ Man ] Off-line. Protocol two.
Linklater. This is Weston. The safe house has been breached.
What's your location?
Um, I'm eastbound on Albert Road. I'm just passing Woodstock.
I want eyes on this. Real-time sat feed.
[ Linklater ] And what's the location of the guest?
[ Weston ] We escaped.
- Clarify. Do you have the guest? - Yes! We escaped!
Look, I can make it to the consulate.
There's no chance for S.D.R. I think I might have picked up a tail.
We can't have a gun battle in front of the consulate.
Diplomatic catastrophe.
Where's that satellite feed?
Denied by National Recon. War theater use only.
translation.ko: 분쟁 지역 외엔 볼 수 없답니다

translation.en: Buy us some time.
Do not go to the consulate.
Follow protocol Alpha Zero.
Secure the guest and stay off the grid.
Reconnect at 1800 hours. I repeat: Stay off the grid.
Copy. Copy. Copy.
All right. Cape Town police have responded to the house.
- Confirmed. - [ Linklater ] I want the site secured.
translation.ko: 오케이 - 사망 9명 - 피해 대책 마련 중

translation.en: - [ Richards ] I'm hearing nine dead. - Initiating damage control.
[ Man ] I'm on it. Reaching out to N.I.A. now.
The locals are gonna have that house locked off.
Check all the traffic cameras, police reports.
Find out why Frost wanted to go into that consulate to begin with...
translation.ko: 놈이 왜 영사관에 간 건지 알아야 해

translation.en: and who in the hell else might be after him.
We need to get Weston and Frost out of South Africa. Do we have any tactical teams? Anything in play?
translation.ko: 놈과 웨스턴을 남아공 밖으로 유인할 전략팀이 있나?

translation.en: Yeah, I have assets in Egypt, but they're in deep.
translation.ko: 이집트에 있긴 한데 2년간 공들인 기밀 작전 중이라 지금 불러내기가…

translation.en: If I pull them out, that would compromise two years' worth of work.
translation.ko: 2년간 공들인 기밀 작전 중이라 지금 불러내기가…

translation.en: I can scramble a team from Europe or Asia, but it's gonna take at least 18 hours.
translation.ko: 유럽, 아시아 쪽 팀을 짜려면 18시간은 걸려요

translation.en: At this point, Weston is all we got.
I need to find out who this Matt Weston is right now.
translation.ko: 매트 웨스턴의 신상 자료를 당장 뽑아봐

translation.en: [ Woman ] Matthew James Weston.
to Terry and Madeline Weston, Port Washington, New York.
translation.ko: 1982년 2월 24일 테리, 매들린 웨스턴의 아들로 뉴욕주 포트 워싱턴에서 출생

translation.en: An assault arrest one month after both parents and a younger sister...
were killed in a traffic accident...
translation.ko: 부모와 여동생이 사망한 후 한 달 뒤

translation.en: in which his father's blood alcohol was twice the legal limit.
translation.ko: 부모와 여동생이 사망한 후 한 달 뒤 폭행 혐의로 체포

translation.en: Yale. Degree in economics. Recruited out of Yale Law.
translation.ko: 예일에서 경제학, 법학을 공부한 후 임용됨

translation.en: High marks in analytical and linguistics at the Farm, excellent in tradecraft skills.
translation.ko: 언어 및 정보분석에 탁월하고 첩보 능력이 뛰어남

translation.en: His girlfriend, Ana Moreau, is a French national.
Out. Get out. He reported them as having "close and continuing contact"
translation.ko: 웨스턴이 현재 가까운 관계를 지속 중인 것으로 보고했으며

translation.en: She's a second-year resident in the oncology department at Groote Schuur.
translation.ko: 그루트 스큐어 병원 혈액 종양 내과 레지던트로

translation.en: Get in that car.
She accepted a position with Hôtel-Dieu Hospital in Paris. Starts in two weeks.
translation.ko: 2주 뒤 파리의 시립 병원에서 근무하기로 돼 있음

translation.en: No known political affiliations. She's clean.
I want you to post a car outside their apartment. Use back channels.
And get N.S.A. to cross-check their telephone records and their e-mails, please.
translation.ko: 안보국에 둘의 전화 및 메일 기록 확인 의뢰하고

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
You know, it'd be easier if I knew where we were going.
You just drive, all right? Just drive. Middle lane.
All right.
Hey, what are you doing? Middle lane.
- Just drive around. - All right. I'm driving.
Nice to know who you're talking to. What's your name?
You crushed my windpipe.
Well, you locked me in the trunk.
Come on. You're not N.O.C. You're here under your real name. What is it?
translation.ko: 공작 요원이 아니니 실명 쓰잖나, 이름 뭐야?

translation.en: Weston, Matt. Oh, all right.
How long you been a safe house keeper?
Twelve months. Happy birthday.
Cape Town, that's low-level detail. You should've been out of here by now.
Maybe I requested the assignment.
[ Chuckles ] Or maybe Langley doesn't trust you with anything else.
translation.ko: 임무를 달라곤 했지 본부에서 자넬 못 믿나 보지

translation.en: So, what's your plan?
Oh, let me guess. Follow protocol.
Protocol states that if your house is crashed, you do an S.D.R. to make sure no one's following you,
translation.ko: 안가가 뚫렸을 땐 미행 방지 가이드라인을 따라

translation.en: activate your G.P.S. in your go bag, select another safe house.
translation.ko: 짐 꾸리고 GPS를 켠 뒤 다른 안가로 가야지

translation.en: You think I'm gonna let you just take me in?
I think you need to shut up. [ Chuckles ]
I think you need to consider how your house was attacked in the first place. Have you done that, Matt?
translation.ko: 일단 왜 안가가 뚫렸는질 생각해봐야지, 생각해봤나?

translation.en: They followed Kiefer. They followed him from the consulate.
And that's how they found the safe house. You don't really believe that.
How did they know I was near the consulate in the first place?
translation.ko: 내가 영사관 근처에 있던 건 어떻게 알았을까?

translation.en: But I like this, you know-- you and me figuring shit out.
Like, uh, the Hardy Boys.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 재미있군 자네와의 이런 대화 하디 보이스 같네

translation.en: That house was a secure location.
Whoever crashed it didn't stop by a gas station... and ask for directions to the nearest safe house.
translation.ko: 놈들이 주유소에 가서 제일 가까운 안가를 물었겠나?

translation.en: They were invited. Someone told them, Matthew. Think about it.
translation.ko: 누군가가 불러들인 거야 자네가 잘 아는 내부인

translation.en: Someone you know. So you better ask yourself: Can you trust your landlord?
translation.ko: 자네가 잘 아는 내부인 자네 직속 상사는 믿을 만한가?

translation.en: Go ahead. You're not gonna get in my head. I already am in your head.
translation.ko: 그런 헛소리에 안 넘어가 이미 넘어왔잖아

translation.en: They're gonna isolate you, Matt. They're gonna be real nice to you at first.
translation.ko: 저들은 자넬 고립시킬 거야 처음엔 칭찬하겠지 어깨를 두드리며 말할 거야

translation.en: They're gonna put their arm around you...
translation.ko: 처음엔 칭찬하겠지 어깨를 두드리며 말할 거야

translation.en: and tell you things like, "You did a decent job, son.
translation.ko: 처음엔 칭찬하겠지 어깨를 두드리며 말할 거야 '잘했네, 이젠 우리한테 맡겨' 그 뒤론 엿 먹는 거지

translation.en: We'll take it from here." That's when you know you're screwed.
translation.ko: '잘했네, 이젠 우리한테 맡겨' 그 뒤론 엿 먹는 거지

translation.en: Forget about me. They're gonna focus on you. They're gonna try and make a connection between you and I,
translation.ko: 이젠 자넬 쫓을 거야 나와 뭔가 엮으려 하겠지

translation.en: so that if this all goes wrong, they'll have something to fall back on in their little Senate hearings.
translation.ko: 일이 잘못되면 청문회에서 희생양이 필요할 테니까

translation.en: I'm not your only enemy tonight.
[ Whitford ] So it's someone in-house.
It's the only way this thing could've happened.
We were completely buttoned up.
I want a list of everyone who knew about this.
Backgrounds, affiliations, particularly any connections with Frost.
translation.ko: 출신 배경, 소속 특히 프로스트와의 연관점

translation.en: Every movement, right up until this operation.
Your extraction team, how long had they been together?
translation.ko: 그 추출팀은 얼마 동안 함께 일했나?

translation.en: My team had been together six months. Why?
Well, I'm just trying to get my head around this.
That'll do. Thank you.
[ Ana ] Hello. Hey.
Baby, where are you?
I'm all right. I'm okay. I'm okay.
I'm sorry I didn't call you back. I saw your missed calls.
You must be worried sick. Is everything okay?
I'm good. I'm good. Listen. Um--
This sounds so crazy.
We had some threats against the clinic last night, so Parker and I, we stayed all night trying to get to the bottom of it. And, uh-- And, uh--
translation.ko: NGO에 대한 테러 협박 때문에 어제 파커랑 밤 꼬박 새웠어

translation.en: I'm sorry that I didn't call you back. I should have right away.
I was so worried. I know.
Can you do me a favor? Can you go over to the window for a second?
Why?
Can you just take a-- Just take a quick look out the window.
I want you to see if there's anyone out there. Any, uh--
Are there any cars that don't belong, anything?
Anyone hanging around out front?
There's a police car.
What's going on? I'm sorry about this.
I know this is a lot,
but they felt like it would be best if we didn't go home as a precaution. I agree with them. There's nothing to worry about, but I agree with them.
translation.ko: 파커 말이 만약을 위해서 집에 안 가는 게 좋겠대

translation.en: I think you should just go to Dena's for a little while, just for a few hours.
I'll call you in a little bit, and we'll, you know-- we'll--
we'll get together, okay?
Okay, I'll go.
[ Weston ] Okay. All right. I love you.
I'll talk to you soon, all right? Don't worry, okay?
translation.ko: 그래, 사랑해, 전화할게 걱정 마, 끊어

translation.en: Okay, bye.
She know what you do for a living?
The girl on the phone. It was a girl, wasn't it?
Maybe it was a guy, I don't know.
I don't judge.
You can't expect to have a real relationship in our line of work, Matthew.
translation.ko: 우리 같은 직업은 깊은 인연을 맺어선 안 돼

translation.en: Don't worry. She's not gonna leave you. See, what happens is you try to protect her with lies,
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 그녀는 자넬 안 떠나 자넨 그녀를 지키려 하겠지

translation.en: and then it starts to add up.
At the safe house, you said that they'd kill me to get to you.
- After a while, even the truth starts to sound like a lie. - Why?
You have something. You got something that they want.
What is it? A local girl?
- Don't worry about her. - Oh, it is a girl.
translation.ko: - 현지 여자야? - 그녀에겐 신경 꺼 여자 맞네

translation.en: You'll keep covering your tracks.
translation.ko: 자넨 계속 행적을 속이고 여잔 믿겠지

translation.en: She'll keep believing, because she wants to, because she needs to.
translation.ko: 자넨 계속 행적을 속이고 여잔 믿겠지 믿고 싶고, 또 믿어야 하니까

translation.en: That's why we exist, you and me. That's our job.
To take advantage of that--
people's desire to believe.
To trust.
She's not gonna leave you, Matthew.
You're gonna leave her.
I'm not you.
He's your boy. You take it.
[ Man ] Everybody stand by.
- [ Ringing Stops ] - Matty, it's me.
How you holding up?
I'm all right.
Matt, we can't get another team in for at least 12 hours.
translation.ko: 매트, 12시간 안엔 다른 팀을 보낼 수가 없어

translation.en: Sorry.
We've cleared a new safe house for you outside the city.
There's a go bag located at locker number 256,
translation.ko: 여행 가방을 그린포인트 스타디움 역 256번 로커에 넣어놨네

translation.en: Green Point Stadium, Metrorail station.
The combination: 2-5-1-22.
Now, the bag's got a G.P.S. in it. It'll direct you to the safe house.
translation.ko: 가방에 GPS가 있어 그게 안가로 인도해 줄 걸세

translation.en: But you gotta be careful. It's an active location.
So approach with caution.
Matt?
Uh, do you-- Do you know how they found Frost? You know who led them to us?
We're working on that.
We're counting on you, Matt.
Get Frost to that safe house and you can write your own ticket.
I will.
I will.
Left at the light.
To the stadium?
Yeah.
[ Weston ] Hey, scarf. How much for the scarf?
[ Man ] Fifty rand, sir.
Cuff your hands together. Together?
Yeah.
Out.
Are you sure you don't wanna just walk away from this?
Can't do that. Yes, you can. You should.
translation.ko: - 그럴 순 없어 - 할 수 있어, 해야 해

translation.en: Move. Go. Across the street.
Going to the game. I like games.
translation.ko: 운동 경기나 보자? 운동 경기 좋지

translation.en: Metrorail, straight ahead. Straight ahead.
Right over there.
Let's go.
- Help! Help! Help! He's trying to kidnap me! - [ Weston ] Whoa, whoa, whoa!
- He's trying to kidnap me! Help! Help! - [ Shouting In Afrikaans ]
- He's got a gun! - I'm undercover. I'm a policeman.
[ Speaking Afrikaans ] Help!
He's got a gun! He's got a gun right there!
I'm undercover. No. I'm undercover.
- I'm undercover. - If you calm down, sir. Everybody calm down!
[ Groans ] Get down! Get down!
Okay! All right! Okay! Okay!
I arrested that man. He's a murderer.
Get up! Get him up! Get up!
All right. I'm just-- I'm an American citizen. I don't know what he-- what he-- what he--
translation.ko: 난 미국 시민이오 영문도 모르고 납치됐소

translation.en: Calm down, all right? Just calm down.
You don't understand. that man is extremely dangerous. A murderer. Huh?
Hey, hey, hey, hey! I'm a police officer. I'm from America.
I arrested this man. His name is Tobin Frost. Where did you take him?
translation.ko: 그자는 내가 체포한 토빈 프로스트요 어디로 데려갔소?

translation.en: He's in the infirmary.
There! There! There! Is that it? Top left!
translation.ko: 저기 봐요, 저기 맞죠? 맨 위 왼쪽, 두 번째! 봐요, 의무실 화면

translation.en: Second screen from the top. Look. Look. The infirmary.
translation.ko: 맨 위 왼쪽, 두 번째! 봐요, 의무실 화면

translation.en: All right. Go back.
Third-tier infirmary now! Move!
Third-tier infirmary. Go now!
You see?
[ Gun Cocks ] Don't move.
Suspect now spotted,
on the southwest upper deck.
Alert on lower concourse.
Suspect sighted passing yellow block 228.
Frost!
Frost!
- Frost! - Hey!
Stop! Stop!
- Get out of the way! - Stop!
Stop! [ Screaming ]
No! Stop!
Medic!
Drop the gun.
Drop it.
I'm responsible for you.
You're responsible for yourself.
Get on your knees.
You gonna kill me?
I only kill professionals.
7:53 PM, FRIDAY [ Man On Police Radio ] Height, approximately six fee.
Anglo, wearing a stadium security jacket.
The suspect was last seen entering Green Point Stadium Metrorail, stadium concourse.
translation.ko: 그린포인트 스타디움 역으로 사라져 지하철을 탔다

translation.en: Sir, we have a thread on what Frost might be doing in Cape Town.
- Uh, can you-- Can you bring up-- - Yeah.
Alec Wade. Fifteen-year NOC at MI6.
Sabotage, counter-ambush, counter-I.E.D. tactics,
until he blew up an op in Lisbon four years ago and was put on a desk, pushing papers.
translation.ko: 4년 전 리스본 작전에 실패 사무직으로 좌천됐죠

translation.en: Cape Town police found him shot through the head.
High-powered rifle. Fourteen blocks from the consulate.
Witnesses placed someone fitting Frost's description... in the car at the time of the shooting.
translation.ko: 당시 프로스트로 보이는 자가 차 안에서 목격됐고요

translation.en: And we think what? That they were working together?
Well, they ran joint operations in Hamburg, mid-'80s.
Frost's last sighting was in Hamburg, 2011.
And what are the Brits saying about Wade? Hmm, officially they're saying nothing.
translation.ko: - 영국 측은 웨이드에 대해 뭐래? - 공식적으론 함구하고 있어요

translation.en: Unofficially?
He's been the subject of a five-month internal investigation. They think he's been trading intel. Hmm.
So what the hell did Wade leak to Frost... that was so important it was worth killing six of our men?
translation.ko: 놈이 판 정보가 얼마나 중요하길래 우리 팀 6명이 희생된 거야?

translation.en: I want more details from MI6. - Call in every chit you got. - Yes, sir.
translation.ko: MI6에 대해 조사해봐 우리한테 빚진 거 이번에 받아

translation.en: And, David, I want an internal investigation of Daniel Kiefer and his team.
translation.ko: 데이비드, 대니얼 키퍼와 그의 팀에 대해 내사해봐

translation.en: - I've got Weston calling in for David Barlow. - [ Man ] Everyone, stand by.
[ Weston On Phone ] I lost him. [ Barlow ] Frost?
[ Weston ] Yeah, he's gone.
After I picked up the G.P.S., he created a diversion, took out a couple of cops at the stadium.
translation.ko: GPS를 꺼낸 직후에 청원 경찰 둘을 죽이고요

translation.en: - [ Barlow ] Any idea where's he's headed? - Not exactly, but I will.
This is Linklater. You said he took out two cops?
Matt, you're on speaker.
Yes, ma'am. At the Green Point Stadium.
The suspect is being described as a white male of medium build--
Stadium police is reporting you shot a cop.
[ Weston ] I returned fire in self-defense.
Look. The fact of the matter is Frost is on the loose.
I've spent the last 14 hours with him. He might have said or done something that could lead me to him.
translation.ko: 제가 본 그의 언행을 분석하면 행방의 단서가 나올 겁니다

translation.en: You are to stand down, proceed to the consulate,
translation.ko: 자넨 이제 손 떼 영사관으로 가서

translation.en: and present yourself for exfil and debrief. Acknowledge.
By the time I'm debriefed, Frost will be gone.
I've spent 12 months researching every square inch of this town.
I will find Frost, and I'll deliver him.
Weston, this is Harlan Whitford, son.
Now you've done a fine job, but we'll take it from here.
Understood.
[ Ana ] Hello?
Sir, I respectfully request that that exchange not make it onto his files.
translation.ko: 방금 통화한 건 그의 기록에 남기지 말죠

translation.en: He's either incompetent, or he's working with somebody else.
Do not make this about Weston.
David-- It was your guys that lost Frost. It was your team folded at the safe house.
translation.ko: 안가에서 프로스트를 놓친 건 자네 팀이야

translation.en: I want both of you on an airplane to Cape Town.
Frost is trying to get out of the country. Go find his ass.
translation.ko: 프로스트는 남아공을 벗어나려고 해, 가서 찾아내

translation.en: [ Whispers ] There you go, baby.
One ticket to Jo'burg.
Thank you.
[ Woman On TV ] Police have detained American N.G.O. worker Matthew Weston..
as a possible suspect in the shooting. Weston had been detained earlier today,
but had managed to escape while being questioned by police--
translation.ko: 체포 후 구금된 웨스턴은 스타디움 청원 경찰에게 신문을 받던 중

translation.en: The suspect has been described as a white male of medium build,
translation.ko: 달아나 종적을 감췄습니다 용의자는 보통 체격의 백인 남성으로

translation.en: possibly wearing a stadium security outfit.
Baby.
Are you all right?
I lied to you.
About everything. The N.G.O., Parker,
my job,
my family.
So who do you work for?
The government.
C.I.A.
No, no. I don't--
I don't do anything. I sit-- I-- I sit around in an apartment all day. I answer the phone.
translation.ko: 하는 일은 없어 종일 틀어박혀 전화만 받아

translation.en: I need you to leave.
I need you to do that for me. Okay?
Here.
This is a ticket to Jo'burg.
When you get there, you go straight to the airport. There's a 6:00 a.m. flight to Paris.
Take this.
You take this. If anyone stops you--
If anyone stops you-- If anybody stops you--
Who do you think I am?
Stop! Stop! Fuck you!
Hey. Stop. Stop it.
We broke up a week ago. You haven't seen me since, okay?
translation.ko: 나랑 일주일 전에 헤어진 후 못 봤다고 해

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Just leave. Please?
- Do you love me? - Very much.
Go. Go.
Go.
[ Woman On P.A. ] Attention, all passengers, platform 20 for Langa Township,
translation.ko: 승객 여러분께 알립니다 랑가 흑인 구역행 기차가

translation.en: departing in five minutes.
Langa Township, departing in five minutes.
translation.ko: "랑가, 스트랜드 멀더스블레이, 벨빌" 랑가행 기차가 5분 뒤에 출발합니다

translation.en: Sir, someone just logged into our system... using Weston's password, accessing his stored files.
translation.ko: 방금 누가 웨스턴의 패스워드로 그의 파일에 접속했습니다

translation.en: It's him. What the hell's he doing?
I want to see what he's looking at.
[ Richards ] He's pulled an old report on surveillance targets...
translation.ko: 자신이 쓴 랑가 거주 감시 대상자 보고서입니다

translation.en: living in the Langa Township area.
It's a profile of Carlos Villar, a Nicaraguan national.
translation.ko: "카를로스 빌라" 니카라과 출신 카를로스 빌라의 프로필이에요

translation.en: He's a known document forger.
- [ Whitford ] Get me a copy of Weston's report. - [ Richards ] Yes, sir.
translation.ko: 그 보고서 사본 좀 뽑아줘 네

translation.en: Oh, shit. Logged off, sir. He's gone.
An Internet café on Long Street.
- The black Dorian Gray. - That's right.
How you doing, brother? [ Chuckles ]
Come in. Yes, sir.
Illana.
[ Illana ] Hi. We have a guest.
Illana. Good to meet you. Joseph. My daughter.
How are you? Hello.
My son-in-law.
- [ Chuckles ] - [ Illana ] May I offer you some tea?
Uh, no. We're going upstairs.
I remembered.
You even let it breathe.
"Too long a sacrifice can make a stone of the heart.
translation.ko: '너무 오랜 희생은 사람의 마음을 돌로 만들 수 있다'

translation.en: O when may it suffice?
That is heaven's part."
In the old days, a cheap bottle of Flor de Caña kept us happy all night.
Mmm. Tastes change.
People change.
People don't change.
We grow old.
And some of us adapt...
and learn how to enjoy simple pleasures of life,
translation.ko: 단순한 삶의 기쁨을 누리는 법을 배우지

translation.en: like a family, a home.
And for you,
what's in that glass right now, for you, is as good as it's ever gonna be.
translation.ko: 지금의 그 와인 맛이 남은 평생 최고로 기억될 거야

translation.en: One day you'll understand...
you got more past than future. You'll learn.
translation.ko: 이젠 살아온 날이 살아갈 날보다 많다는 걸

translation.en: What is this? An intervention?
I thought you were dead.
So, what brings you to my home in the middle of the night after all these years?
translation.ko: 몇 년 만에 갑자기 왜 이 밤중에 찾아온 건가?

translation.en: [ Woman ] Papa?
Uh-huh? We're going.
Okay, be careful. Okay, Papa.
What are you gonna do with this?
translation.ko: "비밀 송금 내역" 이 정보로 뭘 할 건가?

translation.en: Gonna make some money.
Let me borrow your glasses.
That's it. Listen.
I'm gonna need a new passport,
photo I.D., driver's license, the whole shebang.
translation.ko: 여권이 필요해요 신분증과 운전 면허증도 만들어줄 수 있어요?

translation.en: Can you do that for me?
Yeah.
You sure?
Yes.
Weston never showed at the consulate.
And he was just accessing our secure server, searching for someone to create an alias package.
translation.ko: 위조 신분증을 만들려고 우리 보안 서버에 접속했나 봐요

translation.en: He's trying to leave the country.
Or he's going after Frost.
[ Linklater ] Look at what happened at the soccer stadium.
This guy let Frost escape.
I think Weston's turned.
I know this boy.
He's been looking for a chance to prove himself.
He's trying to bring in Frost.
Come on, David. You're not seeing the evidence.
[ Clears Throat ] Not my best work,
but given the pressure of time, it's passable.
translation.ko: 시간이 없어서 급히 만들었지만 통과될 거야

translation.en: It's good. I'll wire you the money as soon as I get out of town.
Tobin, don't do this. It's different.
translation.ko: 토빈, 이거 하지 말게, 이건 달라

translation.en: You don't need the trouble. You don't need the money.
translation.ko: 이젠 조용히 살아, 돈 필요 없잖나

translation.en: - You can give it-- - [ Gunshot ]
- [ Illana ] Carlos! - Illana!
Carlos! [ Screams ] Illana!
Carlos.
Carlos!
Go.
Vete. Go.
- He's on the roof! - [ Machine Gun Fire ]
Go! Go!
Get in the car!
They think they can come at me like this.
Have to do a whole lot better than that.
Shit!
Yeah, Matt, how'd you find me?
It wasn't that hard.
Let's go.
Wait, wait, wait, wait.
Who do you work for?
[ Weston ] Who sent you?
Who sent you? Who sent you?
[ Man Groaning ] Who?
Vargas. Huh?
Vargas.
Who's Vargas? Who's Vargas?
You wanna die? Huh?
Who's Vargas? [ Gun Cocks ]
Matt.
C.I.A.
C.I.A.! C.I.A.!
6:17 AM, SATURDAY Report?
There was a shoot-out in the Langa Township.
Two crime scenes. One at the residence of Carlos Villar.
He's a document forger. The other, a nearby tenement.
translation.ko: 서류 위조범이죠 또 한 군데는 쪽방촌이오

translation.en: And where was Frost last seen? Tenement.
Have fun at Villar's.
We'll meet up later.
You were right about Ana.
That's her name.
[ Frost ] Sorry to hear that.
Most case officers get married three, four times.
You?
Once.
You're falling apart over here.
Don't kill innocent people, Matthew.
What?
Air traffic controller. Tiny airstrip in Bermuda.
George Edwart Cox. I remember that name.
translation.ko: 조지 에드워트 콕스 그 이름이 생생해

translation.en: Edwart, with a "T."
My inside officer said, uh, he was organizing arms shipments,
but he was just an air traffic controller. He was just a guy.
I put a bullet in his skull.
Black ops came in, they replaced him with one of their own,
translation.ko: 한 비밀 요원이 그의 자리에 들어가

translation.en: crashed a Gulfstream in the ocean that night.
translation.ko: 그날 밤 걸프스트림 한 대를 추락시켰어

translation.en: Thing was, the family that was on the plane--
translation.ko: 그 비행기에 탄 한 가족의 가장이

translation.en: husband-- he was a whistle-blower.
Whole thing was about...
stopping him from testifying about wet works...
translation.ko: 그가 정부의 비리에 대해 증언하는 걸

translation.en: to a congressional hearing.
That's why you left. No.
I went back to work the next day like nothing ever happened.
You practice anything a long time, you get good at it.
You tell a hundred lies a day, it sounds like the truth.
Everyone betrays everyone.
That's a shitty excuse.
Yeah, I used to be innocent like you.
Wrap myself up in the flag.
I'm gonna take you in.
Good for you.
- Barlow. - [ Linklater ] So, witnesses identified a pair of men...
translation.ko: 발로우다 둘의 인상착의와 닮은 두 남자가 목격됐어요

translation.en: fitting Weston and Frost's description leaving this location together.
translation.ko: 둘의 인상착의와 닮은 두 남자가 목격됐어요 그곳을 함께 떠났대요

translation.en: - So he pulled it off. - Weston is aiding and abetting a fugitive.
translation.ko: 프로스트를 잡았군 웨스턴은 지금 도망자를 방조하고 있어요

translation.en: [ Barlow ] You're wrong.
If he's with Frost, he's taking him to the safe house.
[ Watch Beeps ] That's where we gotta be.
Fine. Fine.
Meet me at the crossroads at Old Malmesbury Road.
Who are you?
You Weston?
Give me the shotgun.
What the hell is this? Who are you?
I'm Keller. Safe house keeper.
Authorization index: Bravo Four Seven Oscar Whiskey Six.
Inside. Let's go.
Left.
Slowly.
I don't know who trained you, man, but this sure as hell ain't protocol.
Where's the guest room?
Well, that's the thing. We don't really have one.
In there. In there.
To the pipe.
Out. Over there.
All right.
Control room.
Whatever you say, man. It's your rodeo.
Call it in. Let me hear it.
[ Man ] Landlord. My guest is here.
Account? Abaresque Limited.
With a guest? Yeah, package delivered.
Confirmed. Pickup scheduled.
All right. They're on the way.
Can we at least put the gun down now?
Thanks, Clayton. Bye.
It's a microchip.
What?
That was my guy from MI6. Wade got his hands on a microchip.
translation.ko: MI6 측 말로는 웨이드가 칩을 입수했대요

translation.en: And what was on it? Only Wade knew.
But I think it's safe to assume that's why he hooked up with Frost-- to sell it.
translation.ko: 그래서 프로스트와 엮였나 봐요 그걸 팔려고…

translation.en: Let's get moving.
Long day, huh?
Yeah. I can only imagine. With Tobin Frost.
That man's a legend.
I hope you picked up something. I mean, you ain't gonna find a better education.
translation.ko: 어디서도 배울 수 없는 많은 걸 배웠겠군

translation.en: You know, this is the most excitement I've seen.
You're the first guest I've had in 10 months.
[ Chuckles ] But you wouldn't know anything about that now, right?
translation.ko: 자넨 이런 생활 짐작도 못 하겠지?

translation.en: You got a city posting.
Yeah, nightlife, beaches,
little ladies running around everywhere.
I'm jealous.
You got coffee?
Yeah, yeah. It's in the cupboard. Where?
Want me to go get it? I got it.
Why are-- Why are you in Cape Town?
You tell me now. Why?
What is-- What is it?
Dirt list, laundry list.
Israeli Intelligence, five years ago, compiled blackmail intel.
Corrupt agents, German intelligence, MI6.
C.I.A.?
Yes. [ Grunts ]
We gotta get away.
We-- We gotta get outta here.
Ah, shit.
Don't-- Don't, don't, don't.
Don't. No. Don't-- Don't leave me here, please.
translation.ko: 안 돼요, 날 두고 가지 마요

translation.en: Don't-- Don't do it, please. Please.
Matt?
Hey.
How you doing?
I'm proud of you.
And what you pulled off.
You're gonna make a hell of a case officer.
Where's Frost?
Ah, he's gone.
Place is a wreck. And blood everywhere.
Was he injured or--
I guess you know he killed Keller.
No.
I killed Keller.
Frost killed Keller.
He killed Linklater too.
Did he talk about anything? Any-- Anything he was after?
translation.ko: 놈이 무슨 얘기 않던가? 뭘 찾고 있는지

translation.en: Anything he might have had?
File.
A file?
The file that you're on.
Along with a lot of other people. Important people.
Listen to me. What would you do...
if someone is watching your every move--
some maybe you're not proud of,
and you will have some you're not proud of, believe me--
and then tries to use it against you?
You'd do what you have to do.
You'd do what you have to do.
Where's the file?
Matt, the file. Where is the file?
You're a dead man.
Yeah. A long time now.
Frost is here.
Let's go.
We got him.
A hell of a job.
You smell that, huh?
That Pinotage is a good grape. Great wine, yeah. Local grape, Pinotage. Great--
translation.ko: 피노타지 향이야 이곳에서 나는 좋은 와인이지

translation.en: [ Whispers ] I don't want you losing this one.
This is worth a lot of money.
You-- You're a good boy, Matty. You-You--
You know what you are?
I know what you're not.
You're better than me.
No, it's okay. Just... be better than me.
translation.ko: 그냥… 그냥 나보단… 더 잘 해봐

translation.en: You promise me.
Yeah.
Well, let's-let's-let's-let's--
Let's-- Let's go.
I just gotta get up. I need to get up. [ Grunts ] No, just--
[ Grunts ] Stay.
Just-- Just stay.
Hey.
That's, uh, exactly as it happened.
Well, obviously this situation needs to be handled with a certain amount of finesse.
translation.ko: 이 상황은 좀 섬세히 처리해야 할 필요가 있어

translation.en: Has anybody else seen this report?
translation.ko: 이 보고서 또 본 사람 있나?

translation.en: No, sir. Not yet.
Matt, I'm sure this comes as no surprise,
but parts of this report are gonna have to be altered for national security.
translation.ko: 국가 안보를 위해 일부 수정할 필요가 있네

translation.en: Which parts, sir? Well,
David Barlow can't be held responsible for what happened to the safe house.
translation.ko: 안가 사건은 데이비드 발로우와 연관이 없는 거로 해야 해

translation.en: We just don't need the scandal.
But, sir, you and I both know that that's just not the truth.
People don't want the truth anymore, Matt.
It's too messy. Keeps them up nights.
I tell you what I am willing to do though.
I think the Agency has grossly underestimated you,
and I'm recommending you for a senior case officer position.
Provided you still want it.
That's a generous offer, sir.
There's just one thing you need to clarify for me.
translation.ko: 한 가지 분명히 해줄 게 있네

translation.en: Of course.
Frost may have been carrying some vital intel.
translation.ko: 프로스트가 중요한 정보를 갖고 있었을 거야

translation.en: A file.
I'm not seeing that anywhere in this report.
What was on the file, sir?
Something that, quite frankly, could be very damaging to the Agency and to our allies.
translation.ko: 우리 CIA와 협력자들에게 타격이 큰 내용이지

translation.en: I don't see why Frost would even mention something like that to me.
translation.ko: 프로스트가 그런 얘길 제게 왜 했겠습니까?

translation.en: No, I suppose he wouldn't, would he?
You realize though that if that file did leak,
what would happen to the person responsible.
That person would be arrested, sir.
He'd be risking everything.
He'd have enemies in every intelligence agency in the world.
translation.ko: 세계 각국 정보부에 적이 생길 테니까

translation.en: In the eyes of the C.I.A., he'd be just like Tobin Frost.
Frost didn't say anything about a file, sir.
All right, son.
Take a few days off.
We'll get you started next week.
Thank you.
And, uh, think about our conversation, would you?
translation.ko: 그리고 내가 한 말 생각 좀 해봐

translation.en: Will do.
I'll take it from here, sir.
[ Man On TV ] Media outlets received a controversial file from an anonymous source.
The international intelligence community is still reeling...
from the release of so many highly classified documents...
and the revelations of widespread corruption...
translation.ko: 광범위한 부패 증거가 담긴 문서 유출로

translation.en: and criminal activity at the C.I.A., the B.N.D.--
translation.ko: 광범위한 부패 증거가 담긴 문서 유출로 - 당황한 모습입니다 - 이에 충격을 받은 영국 의회는

translation.en: [ Man #2 ] ...is in an uproar over the lack of oversight given to British Intelligence,
translation.ko: - 당황한 모습입니다 - 이에 충격을 받은 영국 의회는

translation.en: demanding accountability of the rogue agents. Officials at MI6 are fully cooperating--
translation.ko: 책임 규명을 요구했고 MI6는 협조를 약속…

translation.en: [ Man #3 ] Chancellor Merkel insists that the B.N.D....
translation.ko: 메르켈 총리는 BND가 부패 요원들을 감싸고 있다고 질책했습니다

translation.en: has already identified the corrupt agents and contained the intelligence breach.
She has ensured her international counterparts-- [ Man #4 ] ...indictments are now expected within the week, and that Congress...
translation.ko: - 총리는 각국 정부에… - 이번 주에 기소키로…

translation.en: has demanded that Deputy Director Harlan Whitford...
testify before a Senate subcommittee,
in an effort to determine how many people at the C.I.A. are involved in this...
and just how far up the corruption reaches.
